verses.roman:
śloka-vyākhyā lāgi' ei kariluṅ ābhāsa
ebe kari ślokera mūlārtha prakāśa

synonyms: śloka-vyākhyā—of the explanation of the verse; lāgi'-for the matter; ei—this; kariluṅ—I did; ābhāsa—indication; ebe—now; kari—let Me do; ślokera—of the verse; mūla-artha—the real meaning; prakāśa—the manifestation.
translation: "I have given all these explanations just to indicate the purpose of the verse. Allow Me to explain the real purpose of the verse.
